column1: slower, full ball, straying into the pads, picked off through backward square leg. Biiiig no-ball from Morris
138ks low full-toss pushed wide outside off, Rohit reaches out for the ball with his hands and drives through the covers
pitched up and just a shade outside off, Dhawan doesn't quite get underneath the length. He toe-ends a drive to mid-off
back of a length and angling in at off, Morris cranks it up to 140ks, Rohit gets right behind the line and defends to cover
quick offcutter, floated in at middle, Rohit nudges it defensively to the leg side
follows the change-up with a loose half-volley on off, Rohit stretches out and drives it firmly past the right of the bowler and left of Dhawan

back of a length and veering down leg, nearly 140ks, Rohit uses the pace of Morris to his advantage, and whips it away fine past the left of the keeper to round out the first over with back-to-back boundaries
full on the stumps, forward and bunted to midwicket
pitched up and attacking off stump, Rohit's forward defensive intervenes

Dala belts out an appeal for leg-before. And the finger goes up. Was it slanting down the leg side? Rohit chooses not to challenge the on-field out decision. The umpires check for the no-ball: Dala is all good. Pretty full and skids back into Rohit, who plays all around it, and plays late. He is pinned on the pad, but it might have headed past leg stump? Dala has dismissed Rohit for the third time this T20 series
Raina announces himself with a lovely six. Full and sliding outside leg, Raina picks it up and stylishly whips it over the square leg boundary
good length and outside off, Raina presses forward. Driven on the up through the covers
rising short ball outside off, Raina rises with it and pats it down like a gamboling puppy
clipped off the pads through midwicket
darted short and outside off, Raina, having ventured outside leg, has ample leverage to punch it crisply through extra cover
Duminy straightens his line, skids on middle, turned to the leg side off the back foot
tossed on middle stump, non-turner, driven back to Duminy
loopier and fuller on off, Dhawan stretches out and drives a single down to long-off
flat and skidding in to beat the inside edge and ping the pad but this was always heading down the leg side
back of a length and slanting away outside off, tapped to short cover
short and angling down leg, helped to fine leg
good length and angling across off, Dhawan flashes... and misses
much shorter and angling away outside off, Dhawan gets on top of the bounce and punches between covers and point
slower back of a length ball outside off, barely 120ks, Dhawan spots the change-up and muscles it over midwicket
very full and angling away outside off, Dhawan reaches out for the ball and flat-bats it to the covers
... and Raina welcomes him too with a boundary. Good length and outside off, Raina races down the track and clatters it straight of mid-off
whoa! Pitched up and outside off, Raina eases into a drive and times it beautifully through extra cover. Classic Raina shot. So easy on the eye
too full and straight, hangs back and works it to deep midwicket
short and skidding on outside off, rushes Dhawan into a pull. Instead, he short-arm flaps it to midwicket
Andile ventures a slower offcutter and pushes it past the tramline
back of a length on the hips, bunted to midwicket
Raina gives himself room, the bowler chases him and cramps him up for room. Chopped to point
back of a length and outside off, Raina jumps across off and short-arms it away to deep square leg. He has raced to 26 off 14 balls
Raina jumps outside leg this time, Morris floats a short, slower ball wide outside off. Raina reaches out for the ball with his hands, then cracks it past the right of point
short and outside off, Raina stays still and shovels it to deep square leg

Dropped at short third man. Shamsi lets the ball burst out. Shoddy effort. Short, wide outside off, Dhawan cuts in the air, Shamsi attempts the catch with both hands but drops the sitter. He was on the move and never really stable to cling onto the catch
low full-toss on off, tapped to mid-on off the front foot
back of a length and outside off, guided square of Shamsi now for one
tossed up and drifting in to catch the front thigh
darted on middle, swept away to deep square leg
looped up on middle, turns away, tipped into the covers off the front foot
Dhawan steps out, Duminy drags his length back on off. Forced back to him

Dhawan dares to skip down the pitch again, this offbreak dips, creating distance between the bat and the pitch of the ball. Dhawan swings, loses his shape, and drags an inside edge behind square on the leg side
worked off the pads square through the leg side
tossed full on leg stump, whipped to deep square leg
pushed through flatter and quicker, breaks back in to hit the pad as Raina plays across the line. Suspect he has managed an inside edge there
skidder, full on middle, played back to the bowler
whipped from off stump to long-on
down the track and drilled straight to cover
Dhawan ventures down the track again, this is dragged short and outside off, forced in the gap at cover
slower through the air outside off, breaks away, Dhawan drags a sweep to deep square leg. He is yet to find the boundary
shorter and outside off, stabbed to the covers
half-tracker outside off, Dhawan can hack it only as far as wide long-on. He continues to struggle with his timing
skids on just outside off, Raina moves away outside leg and punches the ball on the up to Behardien to cover-point. He looks away, so can't deal with the bad bounce, and concedes a boundary
full and outside off, caressed through the line through cover
flat on off, forced to long-off off the back foot
full and sliding in, Raina tickles an inside edge to the left of the bowler. Shamsi chases the ball but fumbles. Raina dishes out a full-length dive and gets the single he was looking for
Dhawan shapes to reverse-sweep. Shami drags it short outside leg. Smeared to deep square leg
Dhawan aims a biig slog-sweep now, he can only drag it to deep square leg off the inside half

Behardien runs to his right from long-on and tracks down this loft from Raina. Looped up on off stump, Raina hoists it in the air but doesn't get enough power behind the shot and can't clear Behardien in the deep. He's gone for a punchy 43
clipped off the hips to deep square leg
skids on outside off, 96ks, punched off the back foot to long-on
pitched up outside off, driven off the front foot to long-on
tossed outside off, Pandey stays leg-side of the ball and carves a drive to the off-side sweeper
Dhawan dashes down the track, gets too close to the pitch, and jabs it back to the bowler
Dhawan steps out, manufactures a full-toss, hacks to long-off
slower through the air on middle, played back to the left of the bowler. Phangiso tumbles and gathers the ball
darted into the pads, deflected square on the leg side
Pandey launches a six over Miller at wide long-on. Pandey swings across the line and clears Miller who was about 5-7 metres in from the boundary
worked to midwicket for one
Dhawan finally finds the boundary after 29 balls in the 12th over. Half-tracker outside off, slugged away to the deep square leg boundary
down the track and drilled past the right of the bowler
low full-toss on middle, whipped to deep midwicket
another half-tracker, another boundary for Dhawan. He picks up the length early and crunches a pull to the midwicket boundary
Pandey shimmies down the pitch, but the ball dips, he hoicks an inside edge to long-on
low-arm slider outside off, Dhawan swishes... and misses

Shamsi runs back from short fine leg and drops another catch. This is a difficult chance. Tossed up on leg stump, bounces more than Dhawan expected, fetches the top edge, and the opener survives again
Bam! Dhawan dashes out and smears this over Pandey's head. It hurtles away to the left of long-off to the boundary. Just like that Dhawan has three boundaries in six balls
tossed outside off, slog-swept powerfully to deep midwicket
driven through the line to long-off off the front foot

Dala returns and has Pandey holing out to long-on. He runs in hard and hits the pitch harder. Banged in short at off stump, Pandey can't control a pull. He aimed to hit it over midwicket. Instead, drags it straighter to Miller
back of a length and outside off, creamed to deep point
full and wide outside off, toe-ended to mid-off
nip-backer on a back of a length, Pandya squirts an inside edge onto the pad and gets off the mark
short and outside off, muscled to wide long-on
full and outside off, bunted to extra cover for one
slower offcutter, drifted down leg, wide
on a length and outside off, driven on the up past the left of mid-off
Pandya shuffles across off and nurdles an offcutter to long leg
another slower cutter, Pandya steps out, adjusts to the pace or the lack of it, and scoops it back
back of a length on off, cramps Pandya for room, fended back to the bowler
dug in short on off, Pandya looks away, takes his eyes off the ball, and swats it to deep square leg
another leg-side wide from Andile
full-toss on middle, Dhawan clears his front leg and forces the ball down to long-on

Dhawan steps out the track and hoicks a shorter ball to deep midwicket. Dhawan chances a second but he has been caught short by a belting direct hit from Junior Dala in the deep. He's come of age. He attacked the ball and nailed the stumps down. End of a Jekyll-Hyde innings from Dhawan.
skidding on outside off, chopped off the back foot to point
tucked off the pads square of short fine leg for one
non-turner on off, back of a length, forced down to long-off
Dhoni hangs back and whips one off the hips to square leg
prodded into the covers for one
back of a length on off, punched on the up to long-off
overpitched at off stump, belted down to long-on
shortish on off, slower ball, tapped to deep midwicket. Pandya and Dhoni - you judge who's quicker - hare across for two
slower cutter outside off, sticks in the pitch, stabbed back to Andile
full-toss on off, punched to long-on
back of a length and angling into a gentle little clip to midwicket
full on off, Dhoni calls for two and gets it after gently tapping the ball to wide long-on. Great running from these two
Dhoni dashes down the track, meets this short ball on off, and clubs it away to deep midwicket
Morris errs in length. Aims for the yorker. Comes out as a low full-toss on middle, which is launched into the stands beyond wide long-on. Lovely, smooth swing from Pandya
back of a length on off, stabbed to wide long-on
bouncer on off, beats Dhoni's hook
Dhoni dances down the track and drags this short ball on middle to short fine leg
wide yorker, Dhoni throws his bat at the ball and jams an inside edge fine of short fine leg

Dhoni swings, gets more height as opposed to distance, and finds Miller at the edge of the long-off boundary. Length ball outside off - right in the hitting radar - but Dhoni can't get enough behind the shot. Dala's evening keeps getting better
off-side wide
overpitched and wide outside off, Pandya stays leg-side of the ball and drills a drive to sweeper cover
back of a length and outside off, Karthik allows the ball to come onto the bat, opens the face, and glides it deftly past backward point
full and outside off, Karthik gets under the length and lifts it smoothly over mid-off, who is up in the circle
dug in short and outside off, Karthik sizes it up and swats a single to deep midwicket
Karthik ventures outside leg and attempts a reverse-scoop. The bowler chases him with a yorker and hits him on the boot. Karthik nearly falls over, then crosses over for a leg bye

back of a length and slanting in, cramps Pandya for room. He eyes up the leg side and aims to lift it over midwicket. Instead, he sends a leading edge to Klaasen, who runs in and settles under this skier
very full and darted down the leg side, tickled away fine past the diving keeper for four
Morris loses his line again and drags it down leg for another leg-side wide

Umpire Jele gives Karthik out lbw. The batsman challenges the on-field out decision. Even before the bowler delivered the ball, Karthik had shuffled across the off stump. He looks to work it away to the leg side. But this reverse-swinging yorker pings his front boot in line with off stump. The tracker returns three reds and Karthik has to exit
middle-stump full-toss, which is whipped to square leg, where Andile fumbles the ball and concedes three
off-stump yorker, 141ks, Axar jabs it to the covers
length ball, fifth-stump line, jabbed out to backward point
full, a little wider, Reeza plays a wavy drive without any footwork and doesn't connect
length ball, closer to off stump, defended to mid-off. A bit of inswing, but not too much

length ball close to off stump, punched firmly into the ground, square on the off side, and it bounces up over the leaping Axar at backward point. He gets his hands to it but can only slow down its progress to the boundary
back of a length on off stump, defended back to the bowler
full on off stump, punched to mid-off, who fumbles, allowing a single
full and the exaggerated angle of Bumrah allows Hendricks to glance a single to fine leg
back of a length and slanting away outside off, punched up to cover
back of a length, pitches outside leg, skids in to open Miller up and strike the thigh
short on middle, Miller gets inside the line and helps it away to deep square leg
short and hits the bat hard as opposed to bat hitting ball. This 143ks rocket is defended to point
Bumrah ventures wide of the crease, gets this full ball to skid back in and hit the thigh. Bumrah's exaggerated angle can be difficult to crack
back of a length on middle stump, Hendricks camps back and turns the ball straight to midwicket
slower ball, 116ks, the batsman checks his shot and guides the ball through the vacant spaces at point
short on off, cramps the batsman for room, squeezed off the inside half to short fine leg for a quick single
140ks bouncer, flies over the hook, Dhoni leaps to collect the ball

Bhuvneshwar fools Hendricks with a 120ks knuckle ball - 20ks slower than the previous ball. Great skill. The batsman does not spot the change-up and is waaaay too early into his loft. He ends up skewing it in the air, Dhawan settles under this at midwicket, and slaps his thigh in celebration, like he often does
tucked off the hips to deep square leg for one
back of a length and angling away outside off, nurdled to square leg
pitched up and angling away outside off, 142ks, Miller stretches out and pumps it over extra cover. Lovely flow of the arms into the lofted drive
good length and angling away outside off, dabbed with the angle to point
shortish and just a shade outside off, steered off the face to deep third man
off-stump yorker, jabbed to point off the front foot
back of a length and running away outside off, Duminy gets on top of the bounce and punches it up to backward point
short on middle and off, stabbed to Karthik at short midwicket
full and slower outside off, Duminy presses forward but does not meet the pitch. Scoops this slower ball in front of short cover diving forward
slower one outside off, another knuckle ball, glided down to third man
full on middle, played back to the bowler with soft hands
back of a length and angling across off, punched on the up to the right of Dhawan, who shows fine reflexes to hunt the ball down
back of a length and angling away outside off, sliced to backward point for one
lifter on middle, Thakur forces Duminy to duck under it
back of a length and skidding away outside off, Duminy reaches out for a cut and watches the ball beat the outside edge
short and outside off, rises on top of the bounce and punches it to square-ish third man
skiddy short ball outside off, rushes the batsman into a pull. He flaps it in the air but it does not carry to short midwicket
Thakur now unfurls a knuckle ball of his own. Miller has a big whoosh at it... and misses
yet another slower one, on off, jabbed back to the left of Thakur. Just 25 runs in the Powerplay
full and veering into the pads, slower cutter at 117ks, worked through square leg
full-toss on off, sliced through cover-point
full and nipping away outside off, slower offcutter, beats the cut
even slower, 119ks, deflected off the pads through backward square leg. Dhoni brings out his trademark between-the-legs flick onto the stumps but Duminy is in
short and angling across off, punched on the up to backward point
full on the stumps, driven to short midwicket, where Rohit pulls off a tumbling save
fired short and wide outside off, scythed away to sweeper cover
another short dart outside off, Miller gives himself additional room and slaps the ball to the cover boundary
the length is still short but the line is closer to off, punched to long-off
much fuller and outside off, 95ks, drilled through the line to long-off
quick fizzer, nearly 100ks, not short enough for a pull. Miller misjudges the length and takes it on the thigh
flatter and speared in, Miller dares to step out and slice it down to long-off
slower ball on off, no pace, no timing. Pushed back to Pandya
It's in Miller's arc, and it's out of the park. Slower ball but the line is on the pads, picked up and hoisted over the square leg boundary
slower offcutter outside off, Miller backs away, loses his shape, and does not make contact
back of a length and skips away outside off past Miller's waft. Dhoni, believe it or not, fumbles behind the stumps. The low bounce on this offcutter beats him
back of a length and outside off, 139ks, jabbed to extra cover
Duminy charges at Pandya, manufactures a full-toss, and hits it right back to the bowler. The asking rate has shot up to 11.72

half-tracker on middle stump, 101ks, Miller lines it up.... and pulls it straight into the lap of deep midwicket. That should've been smashed over the boundary. But it isn't Miller's day. It isn't SA's day. This chase is going nowhere
dragged down on middle, Duminy places it better. Pulled away to the left of deep midwicket
flat and outside off, driven through the line to long-off
seam-up, 101ks, short and wide outside off, smeared only to deep midwicket. Raina gets away
slower offbreak outside off, punched to the off-side sweeper
fast offbreak on off, hit back to the right of Raina
short and cramps the batsman for room, turned to the left of Pandya. He chases after the ball but can't throw the stumps down at the non-striker's end
short and outside off, keeps low and beats the pull
chest-hunting short ball on off, pulled to deep midwicket
Duminy forays down the track, meets a full-toss, and punches to sweeper cover
really full on leg stump, tickled away to fine leg
wide of the crease, full-toss outside off, swiped to wide long-on
short, slid in at 90ks, the batsman backs away and lifts it to long-on, where Thakur dives, juggles, and drops the catch
pushed through outside off, Duminy jumps across off stump and smashes a slog-sweep over the midwicket boundary
back of a length, angling away at 101ks, Duminy sizes it up and whacks it into the stands beyond midwicket
much slower and outside off, slog-swept again to deep midwicket
fired on middle, hoicked off the inside half to wide long-on for a double
Klaasen feigns to reverse-sweep. Axar hikes his pace and spears it wide outside off. Sixteen off Axar's first over
banged in short on middle, hooked away to the right of long leg
back of a length on middle stump, Duminy moves away outside leg and chops a single to backward point
wide of the crease, fired wide outside off, Klaasem having backed away, reaches out for the ball and scythes it to deep point
full and outside leg, shovelled away to fine leg
Klaasen nails it straight to Bhuvneshwar at mid-off. Bhuvneshwar cops a stinging blow. This was pitched further up on middle, the batsman backs away and drills it flat and hard to mid-off
short on off, 140ks, rides it out to point. End of an excellent spell from Pandya: 4-0-22-1
slides on outside off, speared to sweeper cover
straight ball on off, driven right back to Raina
short on middle, Jonker hangs back and pulls it to long leg
poor ball, especially with fine leg inside the circle. Flat dart on the pads, whipped away fine of short fine leg for four
dragged down on leg stump, another poor ball from Raina, Jonker swivels on the back foot and swings a pull to the backward square leg boundary
darted short on off stump, clubbed to deep midwicket off the back foot
short and cramps the batsman for room, tipped back down the pitch for one
dipping yorker outside off, 117ks, Duminy swings across this slower yorker and misses
slower ball on middle, but the length is too full, Duminy picks it, gets under the length, and smites it over the long-on boundary
back of a length and angling away outside off, swiped to deep midwicket
full-toss on off, hacked down to long-on
short and wide outside off, slashed out to backward point
full and wide outside off, Duminy forces to wide long-off
back of a length on off, swatted to long-on
short and width, Duminy stays leg-side of the ball and laces a cover drive to bring up his 11th T20I fifty
back of a length and runs away outside off, Duminy can't connect with the leg-side slog
Duminy slogs against the angle, across the line, gets it to deep midwicket off the inside half

slower knuckle ball outside off, Duminy aims to slug it over midwicket, again. He does not pick the change-up, loses his shape, and winds up top-edging a catch to Rohit at mid-off. Duminy goes and with it SA's hopes?
the batsman ventures outside the leg stump, Bumrah floats a cutter outside off, just inside the tramline, but called a wide
back of a length and just a shade outside off, 141ks, Morris chops a bottom edge fine of short third man
back of a length and outside off again, Morris gives himself room, swings and misses
Bumrah flattens the middle stump. Skiddy back of a length ball on middle stump, barges into Morris' castle. He swipes across the line but only collects fresh air. Bumrah knocks out the middle stump
full and attacking the stumps, inside-edged to fine leg
full on off, drilled to long-off off the front foot
Behardien ventures outside leg, meets a full ball outside off, and creams it inside-out over mid-off inside the circle
back of a length on off stump, Jonker picks it up and muscles it into the stands beyond wide long-on. The debutant held nothing back
full and wide outside off, Jonker scythes it up and over backward point for back-to-back boundaries
looks like a slower cutter, Jonker swipes again but is beaten by the lack of pace
very full on middle stump, Jonker drills it ram-rod straight down the ground, Behardien gets out of the firing line
dragged short and wide outside off, Jonker throws his bat at the ball and toe-ends it back to the bowler
knuckle ball gone wrong as the length is too short and the line is too wide outside off, Jonker is generating massive power. He hits it flat and hard over midwicket. One-bounce four
full-toss on middle stump, Behardien lines it up and whips it away to the backward square leg boundary
full cutter outside off, 122ks, scooped right over the bowler's head. Behardien did not pick the offcutter but got away
122ks slower ball outside off, on a length, Jonker picks it up and smears it over the midwicket boundary again. Bam! He keeps giving SA hope
shorter, 141ks, hits the bat hard, swatted to wide long-on. A misfield in the deep allows the second run
full-toss on middle, 141ks, bunted down to wide long-on for two. They scamper across for the second. Coach Gibson has a smile on his face for, perhaps, the first time this evening
low full-toss on middle, flapped to wide long-on
short of a length and outside off, slower one. Not sure if it was the knuckle ball. Scythed away straight to sweeper cover
short and sprayed too wide outside off, had Behardien left it it would have been an off-side wide. He reaches out for the ball and carves it in the air over short third man
low full-toss on off, Behardien's bottom hand flies off the bat as he pushes it down to long-off
back of a length and swerves away past the tramline, off-side wide
pinpoint yorker on off stump, squeezed down to long-on for two
full on off stump, the batsman hangs back and whips this 140ks rocket between deep square leg and deep midwicket. India have all but wrapped up the series

full-toss outside off, Jonker can only splice a catch to Rohit, the stand-in captain, at extra cover. India add the T20 trophy to the ODI trophy. Another impressive over from Bhuvneshwar Kumar to close it out
